body: I thought I would give this a try based on reviews & because I use Cerave face wash & moisturizing lotion & cream. Also, to take a break from my normal $50-$60 eye creams. This was EXTREMELY drying to under both eyes, made the skin pink & burned really bad under the eyes. Tried using it x4 times & experienced the exact same reaction each time! Definitely NOT good for aging skin, dry skin, sensitive skin, or anyone using Tretinoin or Retinol creams. Beware!!!
